i get SO ANXIOUS when I fly like have  zero control - what if tsa stops me, the plane will leave without you they don’t care if you on or not, what if my bag gets lost, what if I have to go to bathroom but a window seat, now with covid what if someone doesn’t wear mask  !!!

Meanwhile, my mother just sent me a photo of her and my father on a plane coming to visit me. Both are masked and wearing face shields. They look goofy as hell, but they are as safe as they can be.
Bonus - her mask says in big, bold letters I am vaccinated. https://t.co/oair6tXofi
Also eventually I’ll start travelling again and I will not get on a plane without a heavy duty mask.
I actually love wearing my mask on the plane because it makes falling asleep with my mouth open a lot less embarrassing
